featured.text: The ability is 25 to those with leaves that are hydrophobic, or repel water—a special feature that forces the liquid to move away when the leaf is exposed to it.
As the flights grew longer, a new set of two collection bags was devised, _(24)_ for liquid wastes and the other for solid wastes.
Also, drinking a lot of liquid in one go can cause more water to 29 the body quickly and come out as urine.
The liquid was originally a grape alcohol introduced from France in the late 14th century.

other.text: Let the rain beat upon your head with silver liquid drops.
What does the phrase silver liquid drops refer to? 4.

definition.zh_def: 液體；具有流動性的物質，無固定形狀。
definition.en_def: A substance that flows freely and has no fixed shape, typically taking the shape of its container.
definition.example: Water is a common liquid found in nature.
